contentrichtext.text: {{Use mdy dates|date=October 2012}} {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Yamagata |JapaneseName= 山県市 |MapImage=Yamagata in Gifu Prefecture.png |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]] |District= |Area_km2=222.04 |PopDate=July 2012<ref name=GifuEstimate>{{cite web|title=岐阜県の人口・世帯数人口動態統計調査結果|url=http://www.pref.gifu.lg.jp/kensei-unei/kocho-koho/event-calendar/sonota/tokei/jinko201207.html|work=Gifu prefectural website|publisher=Gifu Prefecture|accessdate=August 9, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |Population= 28,878 |Density_km2= auto |Coords={{coord|35|30|N|136|47|E|region:JP_type:city}} |LatitudeDegrees = 35 |LatitudeMinutes = 30 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 136 |LongtitudeMinutes = 47 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree=[[Chestnut]] |Flower=[[Japanese bellflower]] |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Yamagata Gifu.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= Hiromasa Hayashi<ref>{{cite web|title=市長の部屋|url=http://www.city.yamagata.gifu.jp/shisei/sityou/|work=Yamagata official homepage|accessdate=August 9, 2012|language=Japanese}}</ref> |CityHallPostalCode=501–2192 |CityHallAddress=1000-1 Takaki, Yamagata-shi, Gifu-ken |CityHallPhone=0581-22-2111 |CityHallLink=[http://www.city.yamagata.gifu.jp/ City of Yamagata] }} {{nihongo|'''Yamagata'''|山県市|Yamagata-shi}} is a [[cities of Japan|city]] in [[Gifu Prefecture]], Japan. ==Geography== Yamagata is located in south-west Gifu Prefecture, north of [[Gifu, Gifu|Gifu]] city (the prefectural capital of Gifu). '''Surrounding municipalities''' * [[Gifu, Gifu|Gifu]] * [[Motosu, Gifu|Motosu]] * [[Seki, Gifu|Seki]] ==History== * The city was established on April 1, 2003, by merger of the towns of ''Miyama'' and ''Takatomi'', and the village of ''Ijira'', all from [[Yamagata District, Gifu|Yamagata District]]. * The name, Yamagata, has already existed in one of the oldest Japanese [[Koseki|family registry]] which was published in 702 and has been stored in [[Shosoin]], Nara. This fact means that Yamagata is one of the oldest place names in Japanese history. ==Educational institutions== * Yamagata High School * Takatomi Junior High School * Ijira Junior High School * Miyama Junior High School * Takatomi Elementary School * Tomioka Elementary School * Umehara Elementary School * Oga Elementary School * Sakurao Elementary School * Ijira Minami Elementary School * Ijira Kita Elementary School * Miyama Elementary School * Iwazakura Elementary School ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.city.yamagata.gifu.jp/ Yamagata official website] {{ja icon}} [[File:Yamagata City Hall in Gifu.jpg|thumb|left|Yamagata City Hall]] {{Gifu}} [[Category:Cities in Gifu Prefecture]] {{Gifu-geo-stub}}
